name: Love and Hate in Hell Café
name_original: Love and Hate in Hell Café
description:
What would happen if a café were opened between two lands in war? It's time to give Demons and Angels some love! Match an angel and a demon. Nevertheless, it's needed to keep in mind their colour likes and dislikes.

This is a project of a video game made for Ludum Dare Jam 41 - Combine two incompatible genres. Unfortunatelly, I run out of time and I couldn't add too much details on it. But I will do it!

Thanks for playing!
